subject: Parachutes and Parachute Jumping
lead_paragraph: Michel Fournier, a 64-year-old retired French army officer, is expected to attempt to parachute some 25 miles to earth early Monday in Saskatchewan. Fournier’s original plan was to jump on Sunday morning, but weather conditions were expected to be more favorable Monday.
